snippet: After a string of failures on Boeing 787 Dreamliner jets, Underwriters Laboratories said it had developed a tougher test to prevent short circuits that can lead to fire.
abstract: Underwriters Laboratories, after a string of failures on Boeing 787 Dreamliner jets, says it is strengthening its lithium-ion battery standards to prevent short circuits that can lead to fire.
lead_paragraph: After a string of failures on Boeing 787 Dreamliner jets, Underwriters Laboratories said it had developed a tougher test to prevent short circuits that can lead to fire.

headline.main: Standards Are Tightened for Lithium-Ion Batteries
headline.print_headline: Standards Are Tightened For Lithium-Ion Batteries
